name: To Boolean
description: Converts input to boolean. Truthy/falsy logic with customizable rules.

outputs.name: errored
outputs.description: Input data if conversion is ambiguous

settings.name: strictMode
settings.label: Strict Mode
settings.description: Only accept true/false, 1/0, 'true'/'false'. Other values go to errored.

settings.name: emptyArrayIsFalse
settings.label: Empty Array = False
settings.description: Treat [] as false (otherwise true because it's an object)
